entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
